nodes.bodyText: just curious about this change: you mentioned that this PR doesn't address the Apache licenses, so is this to bring this sample in line with the way the other license references are written?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@
 # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
 # You may obtain a copy of the License at
 #
-#      https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

nodes.bodyText: This wasn't intentional. I've done a find&replace to make these https originally, and then F&R to put them all back to http. So looks like this one was https in the first place. We can change it or leave it, it doesn't really matter I think.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@
 # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
 # You may obtain a copy of the License at
 #
-#      https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

nodes.bodyText: not sure if we should be changing gradlew.bat files: but is this just automatic from having made the above change?
looks like some excess spaces have creeped in here
The indentation happens automatically when you break a line after a (, so it should be ok.
